name: Viral Firar
description:
Can You save our heroes from the virtual world?

- Run and destroy trolls
- 5 Different Characters
- Develop and Strengthen
- Various jumping and attack mechanics
- Avoid trolls and dislikes
- Different atmosphere and original music!

Viral Virar is an arcade running game. Try to reach the longest distance using the features of different YouTubers, earn more with each run and improve your characters.

There are very few people who can reach the gold medal, so how long can you run with our heros?

Totally free arcade style runner game.

Choose your runner from PintiPanda Tuna Akşen - Melodi Kızılgün - Stratera Dora Özsoy and Dumbledoge Kemal Gökseloğlu and develop their stats with every run!
